solution_line_template: Her friends will eat {friends_slices_eaten} slices of cake because {num_friends} x {slices_per_friend} = <<{num_friends}*{slices_per_friend}={friends_slices_eaten}>>{friends_slices_eaten}
There will be {total_slices_eaten} slices eaten in total because {friends_slices_eaten} + {amber_eats} = <<{friends_slices_eaten}+{amber_eats}={total_slices_eaten}>>{total_slices_eaten}
She is making {total_slices_made} slices of cake because {num_cakes_baked} x {slices_per_cake} = <<{num_cakes_baked}*{slices_per_cake}={total_slices_made}>>{total_slices_made}
There will be {slices_left_over} pieces left over because {total_slices_made} - {total_slices_eaten} = <<{total_slices_made}-{total_slices_eaten}={slices_left_over}>>{slices_left_over}
